item.title: Dave Moulton’s bike blog
item.description:
If you like bicycles, I recommend Dave Moulton’s bike blog. Last month he relocated from Blogger to Squarespace, and I’ve only just caught up with the new site and adjusted my feed-reader accordingly, the reason being that, when he announced the move, the new site was down (Oops!) so I couldn’t take immediate action.

Dave Moulton’s Bike Blog feed: http://davesbikeblog.squarespace.com/blog/atom.xml.

Incidentally, I use Feedburner, which means I should be able to relocate my site or use different publishing software, and maintain a persistent feed location.
item.author: tag@wordaligned.org (Thomas Guest)
